Description: Anglers must check in with farm manager (027) 275-9644. Driving beyond gate only allowed Monday-Friday 8am-5pm with parking near the woolshed (2 km) in signposted location.  If accessing the property outside of open hours park on Ongarue Waimiha Road. No dogs allowed on property. Stay on farm track and follow orange trail makers to the river entry point (4 Km). Land between the track and river is private until you reach the entry point.
